subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Stan Van Gundy and the Magic are returning to Orlando down 2-0 to the Lakers. With three games to play at home, it’s time to see what the unpretentious coach is made of.
snippet: Stan Van Gundy and the Magic are returning to Orlando down 2-0 to the Lakers. With three games to play at home, it’s time to see what the unpretentious coach is made of.
